Talent Acquisition Consultant for Google Cloud | Diversity Nerd
January 4, 2017, Sarah S. managed Kristofer directly

Kris is a quick learner and embraced being a recruiter and brand ambassador in a high-volume and fast-paced environment.  He has exceptional communication skills and is able to quickly connect with both candidates and clients.  He is systematic and formulaic in his approach as a talent acquisition professional and he constantly strives to make every recruiting process better.  I received nothing but remarkable feedback from his candidates about how he treated them with the utmost care and professionalism.  He was the top performer on the recruiting team for Q4.  He is constantly assessing his own performance and he always shares best practices with his fellow recruiters.  Kris is able to manage multiple tasks concurrently, such as managing the active pipeline of talent while also fueling and growing the passive talent pipeline.  In addition to his daily recruiting duties, he did a phenomenal job representing the company at both career conferences and local community events.  I can't wait for him to lead his own team of recruiters; I am confident that he will make an exceptional people manager.  Kris, thank you for all of your hard work; I look forward to hearing about your future successes!
Sarah S. Noyes
